layout.title: KEMO Collection | Pointlessly Awesome
layout.description: A collection of completely unrelated and possibly useless tools. Enter at your own risk.

quotes: Using this app may cause existential dread
Warning: May contain traces of actual functionality
Built by developers who should know better
KEMO: Because someone had to make this monstrosity
Abandon hope, all ye who enter here
Your code is too clean, try making it worse
Warning: Your UI is too conventional

footer.built_with: Built with questionable decisions and zero practical purpose.
messages: Why are you clicking on a footer? Seriously?
Fine. Keep clicking. See if I care.
I bet you're the type who reads EULAs for fun.

home.intro: This is a carefully curated collection of completely useless tools that somehow managed to escape the recycle bin. Browse at your own risk. Side effects may include confusion, laughter, and questioning why you're wasting your time here.
home.disclaimer: None of these tools were tested or built with any purpose in mind. If you find any actual utility in them, please contact a doctor immediately as you may be experiencing delusions.

random_picker.title: Random Picker
random_picker.description: Can't decide between terrible options? Let us decide for you! (Spoiler: All options are terrible.)

cryptic_generator.title: Cryptic Generator
cryptic_generator.description: Generate mysterious texts that even you won't understand. Perfect for pretending you're smarter than you are.

youtube_summarizer.title: YouTube Channel Summarizer
youtube_summarizer.description: Why waste time watching every video? Let AI analyze entire YouTube channels and tell you what content creators are up to.

ai_narrative_battle.title: AI Narrative Battle
ai_narrative_battle.description: Watch two AIs fight to the death in a pointless grid war. It's like chess, if chess made no sense and was narrated by a drunk poet.

cryptic_generator_tool.title: Cryptic Text Generator (Making Simple Things Complicated)
cryptic_generator_tool.description: Turn your boring text into something so cryptic even you won't understand it. Perfect for pretending you're smarter than you actually are.

output.title: Your Text, But Worse
output.placeholder: Your cryptic text will appear here, assuming the cosmic forces align properly...

random_picker_tool.title: Random Decision Maker (Because You Can't Decide)
random_picker_tool.description: Can't make up your mind? Let our completely biased algorithm decide for you! Warning: We take no responsibility for the consequences.

input.empty_message: Add some options first (yes, more than one)

result.title: The Algorithm Has Spoken
result.disclaimer: Remember: This decision was made by a computer that doesn't care about your life choices.

validation.duplicate: This option already exists (be more creative)
validation.empty: Empty options are not very helpful
validation.max_reached: That's enough options. You're just making this harder.

youtube_summarizer_tool.title: YouTube Channel Analyzer (I'm Not Even Supposed to Be Here)

game.title: KEMO's Pointlessly AI Narrative Battle
game.subtitle: Two AI players fight to the death in a grid. Why? No reason. Welcome to KEMO.

error.title: ERROR (or is it?)
error.hint: Just refresh the page. Or don't. KEMO doesn't actually care about your user experience.

tips: Tip: This game makes no sense by design
Fact: This game was created by an AI to confuse humans
Tip: Clicking buttons randomly is a valid strategy
Warning: Playing this game may cause existential crisis
Note: All decisions are meaningless, just like life
Tip: The real game is convincing yourself this has value

cyberpunk.name: Cyberpunk Dystopia
cyberpunk.description: A neon-soaked urban hellscape where megacorps rule and hackers are the new rockstars. Player A is a rogue AI, Player B is a human hacker.
cyberpunk.rules: Technology rules the world, players compete for digital territories.

wasteland.name: Post-Apocalyptic Wasteland
wasteland.description: Nuclear fallout has left the world a barren wasteland. Player A is a mutant warlord, Player B is the leader of the last human settlement.
wasteland.rules: Resource scarcity drives conflict, survival is the ultimate goal.

fantasy.name: Fantasy Kingdom
fantasy.description: A realm of magic and monsters. Player A is a dark sorcerer, Player B is a noble paladin. They battle for the soul of the kingdom.
fantasy.rules: Magic is real, ancient prophecies guide destiny.

space.name: Space Opera
space.description: The far future among the stars. Player A is an alien hive mind, Player B is the galactic federation's finest captain.
space.rules: Advanced technology, strange new worlds, and the vastness of space.

underwater.name: Underwater Civilization
underwater.description: Beneath the waves, two factions fight for dominance. Player A leads the deep sea creatures, Player B commands the advanced human submarine fleet.
underwater.rules: Water pressure, oxygen limitations, and aquatic terrain affect all actions.

microscopic.name: Microscopic Universe
microscopic.description: Inside a human body, a war rages. Player A is a virus, Player B is the immune system.
microscopic.rules: Tiny scale, massive consequences, complex biological systems.

office.name: Corporate Office
office.description: The most mundane and yet cutthroat battlefield: a corporate office. Player A is middle management, Player B is a new startup employee.
office.rules: Passive-aggressive emails, coffee theft, and the battle for the good chair.

story_panel.title: The Pointlessly Epic Tale of A vs B
story_panel.empty_story: No story yet. Click "Next Turn" to start this pointless narrative.
story_panel.footer: KEMO's AI Narrative Engine‚Ñ¢ - As pointless as your existence

player_a: Player A deployed advanced tech to claim territory.
Player A launched a surprise attack from the shadows.
Player A executed a brilliant strategy with precision.
Player A utilized forbidden knowledge to gain advantage.
Player A called upon ancient powers in a desperate gambit.
Player A hacked the system to change the rules.
Player A built a secret fortress in disputed territory.
player_b: Player B countered with superior numbers and firepower.
Player B orchestrated a clever trap that nearly worked.
Player B rallied allies to defend against the onslaught.
Player B used technology and wisdom in equal measure.
Player B unleashed a devastating counterattack.
Player B deployed defensive measures with surgical precision.
Player B revealed a hidden weapon that changed everything.

a_wins: Player A's superior strategy won the day.
Player A claimed victory through sheer determination.
Player A's resources proved too much for Player B to handle.
Player A exploited a weakness in Player B's defenses.
b_wins: Player B turned the tables at the last moment.
Player B's persistence paid off with a decisive victory.
Player B outmaneuvered Player A in a brilliant tactical move.
Player B's defensive strategy proved impenetrable.
tie: Neither player could gain the upper hand in a tense standoff.
Both players exhausted their resources, ending in stalemate.
A surprise intervention forced both players to retreat.
Mutual destruction was narrowly avoided through reluctant compromise.
